alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ESSEX, EASTERN PASSAIC, AND BERGEN COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM... At 1236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millburn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Orange around 1240 PM EDT. Bloomfield around 1250 PM EDT. Passaic, Lyndhurst and Rutherford around 1255 PM EDT. Paterson and Teterboro around 100 PM EDT. Hackensack around 105 PM EDT. Bergenfield, Paramus, Englewood and Oradell around 110 PM EDT. Norwood around 115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Montclair, Glen Ridge, Closter, Haworth, River Vale, North Arlington, Glen Rock, Teaneck, Elmwood Park and Leonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex
